Keywords: Armor , Latveria , Mystical , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
THE MANY FACES OF DOOM: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a starting line of equal points on a character from your sideline that also has this trait. If you do, replace this character with the chosen character.
THE WORLD WILL ALWAYS HAVE A SORCERER SUPREME: When an opposing character is turned to its starting click (this game), after resolutions roll a d6 and heal Dr. Doom the Sorcerer Supreme equal to half the result.
MYSTICAL SHIELDING: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses.
CHANGE THE FATES: Once per attack, you may reroll the attack roll of a character within range and line of fire.

TheSupreme
If you just want to be really annoying, stick the time gem on him. Technically his special power isn't Probability Control so he should be able to use them both, meaning your opponent will have to hit his 20 defense from range 3 times and hope you don't get your super senses roll.
February 18, 2021
Goop
They can still attack and kill your doombots (cause it has to be a legal target for his 50/50 redirect to work) but i see what you are saying. Dr Fantastic and Doombots make this guy soo much harder to kill. I really REALLY dont want to face this chase on any level.
February 18, 2021
clintw
Goop, my thoughts exactly. I am creating a Doom team. Dr. doom Sorcerer Supreme. Dr. Doom f4021 and Dr Fantastic f4037. Opponent uses probably or outwit Doombots. Sorcerer Supreme can use doombot power since has the keywords needed. Opponent attacks, you roll sorry have to attack doombot, opponent rolls sorry, doombot is safe.
February 16, 2021
Goop
Your "many faces" call in if your opponents team has some healing/support utilized. This is by far the most dangerous figure i've seen in a while. That super probability he has is just crazy strong for 8 range. Then having to kill him through 18 ESD and Super Senses while he has that. Hope you have some outwit because that is the only way you are getting this guy down. Great atk values and powers the whole dial. Honestly this guy is so good it almost throws the whole "faces of doom" thing out the window. Just use him.
